name: Another Game...
description:
Our GMTK 2021 Game Jam Entry - Another Game...

Lynette and her favorite ball must traverse dangerous terrain and escape from the terrifying monster Agatha!

Controls:

WASD to move around

Spacebar to jump (spacebar against the wall to wall jump)

Left Click to launch the ball (hold to aim in slow-mo)

Right-click to retract the ball

Credits:
